00043 static void
00044 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_ConvolutionTest(CuTest* tc)
00045 {
00046         char *file = "C:\\Documents and Settings\\Pierce\\My Documents\\Test Images\\wallpaper_river.jpg";
00047 
00048         FIBITMAP *dib1 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file);
00049 
00050         FIBITMAP *dib2 = FreeImage_ConvertToGreyscale(dib1);
00051 
00052         FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile(dib2, TEMP_DIR "\\testy1.jpg", BIT24);
00053         assert(dib2 != NULL);
00054 
00055         //FIBITMAP *dib3 = FreeImage_ConvertToStandardType(dib2, 1);
00056         ProfileStart("FreeImageAlgorithms_Convert");
00057 
00058         FIBITMAP *dib3 = FreeImage_ConvertToType(dib2, FIT_DOUBLE, 1);
00059 
00060         ProfileStop("FreeImageAlgorithms_Convert");
00061 
00062         FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile(dib3, TEMP_DIR "\\testy2.jpg", BIT24);
00063 
00064         FIABITMAP dib4 = FreeImageAlgorithms_AddBorder(dib3, 3);
00065         FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile(dib4.fib, TEMP_DIR "\\testy3.jpg", BIT8);
00066 
00067         
00068         //FreeImage_Unload(dib3);
00069 
00070         ProfileStart("FreeImageAlgorithms_Convolve");
00071 
00072         FIBITMAP* dib5 = FreeImageAlgorithms_Convolve(dib4, 3, 3, kernel, 48.0);
00073 
00074         //assert(dib5 != NULL);
00075 
00076         //FreeImage_Unload(dib4.fib);
00077 
00078         ProfileStop("FreeImageAlgorithms_Convolve");
00079 
00080         ProfilePrint();
00081 
00082 //      FIBITMAP *dib6 = FreeImage_ConvertToStandardType(dib5, 1);
00083 
00084         //FreeImage_Unload(dib5);
00085 
00086         FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile(dib5, TEMP_DIR "\\testy4.jpg", BIT24);
00087 
00088         //FreeImage_Unload(dib4.fib);
00089         
00090 }

00093 CuSuite* DLL_CALLCONV
00094 CuGetFreeImageAlgorithmsConvolutionSuite(void)
00095 {
00096         CuSuite* suite = CuSuiteNew();
00097 
00098         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_ConvolutionTest);
00099 
00100         return suite;
00101 }
